entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain with snow changing to flurries this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
